description:
Hachiman becomes restless as summer draws to an end. A Firework Festival opens the door for more teasing and many SNAFUs!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Et il retourna à son point de départ une troisième fois.
For the Third Time, He Turns Back on the Path from Whence He Came.
Mitabi, Kare wa Moto Kita Michi e Hikikaesu.
三度, 彼は元来た道へ引き返す.
